## Request for Standing Offer - Environmental Engineering Services

**Request for Standing Offer 5P468-24-0002/A**
### Environmental Engineering Services for National Parks and National Historic Sites

Parks Canada Agency (PCA) invites consulting firms with environmental engineering expertise to submit offers for Standing Offers. The selected consultants will provide professional and technical services on an “as-and-when-requested” basis for various environmental services in National Parks in Canada's North, including locations within Comprehensive Land Claim Agreements (CLCAs) and services identified in the Required Services section of this document.

### Scope of Work

The required environmental services are:

* Environmental impact assessment, permitting, and related studies
* Environmental management of federal facilities
* Contaminated sites consulting services
* Construction planning, design, and supervision related to environmental projects

### Key Requirements

* Perform risk assessments and hazardous material/waste surveys
* Develop remediation action plans, cost estimates, and tender documents
* Provide environmental advisory services and site supervision

### Bid Submission Instructions

* Bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official
* Bids submitted via SAP Ariba will not be accepted; submissions must be made via fax or email
* Enquiries of a technical and contractual nature should be submitted in writing and received no later than five calendar days prior to the closing date
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

### Important Details

* National Parks Regulations require that all work is performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act
* Bidders must obtain documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service to ensure accuracy and completeness
* Late submissions will not be considered

### Contact Information

* Contact name: Sheldon Lalonde
* Email: [sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca](mailto:sheldon.lalonde@pc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 585-3836
* Fax: 1-855-983-1808
